answers.answer: Yeah I would have the baby shower between week 32 & 34. Def have a hospital bag packed earlier than usual too. I know someone who had their baby only a month early but the baby was still only 2 lbs. It must be tough with pre eclampsia. But I wish you and the baby well.  ! Good luck.
Is it high BP only?  Preeclampsia also includes protein in your urine. Have they check your urine for that?  What is your BP typically at?  Very important to monitor this.

Yes i monitor it all the time. ijust checked my bp it was 160/107, which is high. Im only 19, i don't understand why its so high. I'm not stressed or anything. Yes they've tested my urine with extra protein. ive been loosing weight to instead of gaining. but i finally gained 2 lbs. and so many medications they have me on and nothing works.
thank you, i appreciate it. i will for sure make sure that diaper bag is ready. and be ready for a baby shower :)

I had my son at 35wks due to preeclamplsia but had been battling it with different meds since 28wks. This time developed it at 15wks, went into preterm labour at 27wks but they were able to stop it 3 times over 2wks, 29wks and still pregnant now but they said they will keep stopping labour until it effects my baby or my body gives out and the protein gets too much, are thinking another couple of days to couplen of weeks. They definitely wont let me go past 36wks.
omg, see that scares me:( its crazy. May iask how they were able to stop labor?
I'm due Feb 12, and I'm having all of my baby showers early because of the holidays and whatnot. My first baby shower is on the 8th of Nov. so it's up to you. Depending on when you want it :)

Omg i didnt even think about the holidays. Thats sooo true. i think imma aim for the beginning of December end of November hopefully. Before Christmas and stuff. Thanks i didn't even think about that.

question: So i'm 19 years old with very high blood pressure. Which isn't normal, and docs have me changing prescriptions every week and nothing has help at all. My due date is February 14, a valentines babyboy my baby daddy and I are naming Jaydin Eziquiel. Well, i've read a lot about woman with preeclampsia going into emergency c-section or normal labor from 30-36 weeks, which really is scaring me. Anyone have had an experience like this? And if so, should I make a baby shower before that time just to be sure and be prepared? Or just do it the last few weeks when i'm due?  I'm now 22 weeks preggo, half way there. What should i do?
title: preeclampsia, i'm only 19 years old. babyshower?
